data.title: Shraddha Nigam
data.text:
Indian film and television actress

Shraddha Nigam is an Indian film and television actress.[1]

Personal life

[edit]

In 2008, Shraddha married television actor Karan Singh Grover. They divorced 10 months later following reports of his affair with choreographer Nicole Alvarez.[2][3] In 2012, she married Mayank Anand; the couple have jointly owned a fashion line, MASN, since 2011.[4]

Career

[edit]

Shraddha's film debut was Poonilamazha, a 1997 Malayalam film. Her Hindi debut was in Josh in 2000. She later acted in few Hindi films. Her TV debut was the serial Choodiyan.[citation needed] The Times of India wrote that her role as the female lead in Krishna Arjun "stole hearts".[4] In 2010, Shraddha began to focus on her fashion design line.[5] In 2012, she was offered a role opposite Anuj Saxena in a show produced by Bhairavi Raichura.[6]
